Title: Relates to prohibiting forensic evaluations in a custody or visitation proceeding; repealer
Summary: Prohibits courts from ordering an evaluation of a party or child or allowing into evidence a forensic report created by a forensic evaluator on a party or child to assist such court in a child custody or visitation determination.
LawCode: Amd §§70 & 240, rpld §240 sub 1 ¶(a-3), Dom Rel L; amd §651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to prohibiting forensic evaluations in a custody or visitation proceeding; and to repeal certain provisions of the domestic relations law relating thereto
